name: Amanda Mims
text: We placed a delivery order tonight and had the pleasure of placing our order with Albert. He demonstrated wonderful customer service Nd patience.  That was our BEST customer experience with Pizza Hut. Thank you Albert for your patience your genuine interaction. I placed this order on speaker phone and all of my family was impressed.

name: Angela L
text: The pizza is always great. Don‚Äôt order the $3.00 side salad. It was literally a little lettuce and a whole lot of purple onion.

name: MIKE PURCELL
text:
Tried to order multiple times  by phone but they always Answer-then-Hangup.
Go somewhere else for pizza...

name: Shawntae Sloan
text: I like there pizza the best over anyone else‚Äôs in town. We have 5 other places. An I will pick Pizza Hut every time. They have the best of everything all the way around.

name: Val Zuniga
text: I love the pizza there. I would of given it 5 stars but they don't have side salads anymore or my favorite desert but still great food.

name: Tracy Peters
text: Excellent service and friendly staff. Pizzas and wings were ready in less than 10 minutes. Definitely would recommend.

name: Kailee Galyon
text: This is my favorite pizza hut! We always order online and get the carry out at least once a month. The staff is really friendly, and everything runs smoothly with the new COVID regulations.

name: JD Stockman
text: Literally just hung up on me. I asked what their specials were, I settled on one of them, told them which one I wanted, and they hung up on me. I only eat from delivery or drive-thru because of the current quarantine and my current job. Not cool.

name: Anne Diplit
text: Driver ran red light and almost hit me at crosswalk. Made a complaint and was ignored

name: michael kelly
text: The best Pizzahut in town. The staff no matter what time of day are all wonderful.I have never received a bad or even a mediocre order. Great job guys!!!

name: ed haskel
text: Totally awesome meat Lovers

name: Rory Covey
text: The staff seemed so unusually happy to be at work,  and to be working with one another.  The environment was pleasant,  the music in the background was nice,  and the food was good.  The lady that served us,  in a cast I might add, did a most excellent job.  I would recommend this Pizza Hut to any family

name: M L
text: Called for a carryout order... And was greeted with "thank you for calling pizza hut, all our lines are currently busy so please hang up and try again".... 26 calls later.. I will take my money elsewhere.

name: Foxenna GreenForrest
text: Well the price of our food was high compared to when we order the same thing on line. The pasta was a tad over cooked and same with the bread sticks.

name: Egg Static
text: Good service and foodüëç

text: 3 topping large pizza for $10 is one of my all time favorite deals and the garlic butter crust is amazing

name: R Clark
text: It's usually, but I was the last order of the night and it showed.  It was barely edible.

name: outlaw to the end
text: it was ok the pizza was good just a long wait

name: Dennis Graham
text: We ordered a pizza / take out which was very good. Dont normally order from pizza hut. But we did this time. It was delivered in a reasonable amount of time. It was still very hot and tasty. So yes it was worth the money and time.

name: Mari Black
text: Fresh salad, great service & hot fresh food

text: I ordered a pizza for my mom birthday and piza hut wrote happy birthday inside the box for me and my mom.thankyou so much

Great pizza tho.

text: They got the ingredients wrong on my pizza. When I called to complain management was disrespectful and not trying to be accommodating at all.

name: Billy
text: The first time I go there's 3 long hairs baked into my pizza, but I shrug it off since they accepted the error and credited me. So I give them the benefit of the doubt and order a pzone and chicken Alfredo...and end up with cheese that tastes like old plastic, petrified chicken, and sour Alfredo sauce. üò§

name: Terri Allen
text: When I call to order a pizza. They refer to me by name and all ready know where I'm going to pick it up.  They always give me the best deal that they have at the time. There fast the food is hot and the services is friendly.

name: Chris Pounds
text: Ordered curbside at 8:40.Showed up around 8:55.Called at 9:20 and was hung up on.10:00 get a call saying my order was ready.When I told her id been waiting almost an hour she said oh I'm sorry it's dark I didn't see any cars upfront.And the pizza was horrible.

name: LaShanda Saddler
